title: GOLDEN DAWN ARKESTRA  -  STARGAZER
content: golden dawn arkestra: stargazer     (2016, lp, usa, modern imperial) The Golden Dawn Arkestra released their first EP in 2014, followed by the "Stargazer" album in 2016. They have a brand-new album out (or due out) called "Children Of The Sun", so I was in a bit of a hurry to add the data for "Stargazer" on the United Mutations Archives as this is superb material. I love it !! Essential listening. GOLDEN DAWN ARKESTRA 2018 EUROPEAN TOUR DATES 31.05.18 - Düdingen, CT- Bad Bonn Kilbi 01.06.18 - Kleinreifling, AT – Seewiesen Fest 02.06.18 - Aflenz, AT - Sublime 06.06.18 - London, UK - Moth Club 07.06.18 - Lille, FR - La Cave aux Poèt 08.06.18 - Le Havre, FR - Le Tetris 09.06.18 - Tours, FR - Festival Aucard de Tours 10.06.18 - Paris, FR - Espace B 14.06.18 - Oberhausen, DE - Drucklufthaus 15.06.18 - Hannover, DE - Cumberlampe 17.06.18 - Mannheim, DE - Maifeld Derby Festival 19.06.18 - Terschelling, NL – Oerol Festival 22.06.18 - Luxembourg LU - Fete de la Musique 24.06.18 - Berlin, DE - Kantine am Berghain 27.06.18 - Lärz, DE - Fusion Festival 28.06.18 - Lärz, DE - Fusion Festival 29.06.18 - Bocholt, DE - Alte Molkerei 30.06.18 - Paris, FR - Macki Festival
contentWithMarkup:
• golden dawn arkestra: stargazer
        (2016, lp, usa, modern imperial)
The Golden Dawn Arkestra released their first EP in 2014, followed by the "Stargazer" album in 2016.
They have a brand-new album out (or due out) called "Children Of The Sun", so I was in a bit of a hurry to add the data for "Stargazer" on the United Mutations Archives as this is superb material.

I love it !!
Essential listening.
